name: On your shoulders (v0.3.3 fixed edition)
description:
This is side version for people who couldnt experience most of the fun of the game because of 2 issues:

jumping

linux and mac not working

There is also browser version, but because of some bug, I had to mute the "menu" part of the game

for original go here: https://antyco.itch.io/on-your-shoulders
